job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Duties

Job Description:
  • You will join the department of AI/Client within Research Biology.
  • You will collaborate with scientists working on different areas of machine learning and the life sciences.
  • You will closely collaborate with machine learning scientists, computational chemists and bioinformaticians across departments in the organization.
  • You will develop and deploy deep learning methods for representation learning of small molecules and prediction of chemical properties.
  • The work will also involve software development, infrastructure and hardware optimizations, data pipelining, and innovations to implement robust AI solutions for real world use cases.
Skills
  • Demonstrated experience with deep learning frameworks and models (PyTorch is preferred).
  • Proficient in Python.
  • Demonstrated experience in software development, GPU acceleration, model optimization and scaling for multiple server nodes.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Education
  • MSc or PhD degree in a quantitative field (e.g. Computer Science, Computational Chemistry, Machine Learning, Statistics, Mathematics, Physics).
  • Industry experience as data scientist or Client engineer in a healthcare company.
  • Experience in deep learning for graph-based and/or sequence-based data.
  • Experience in deep learning for small molecules.
